snippet: Despite a 5 percent drop in digital advertising, the company’s chief executive, Mark Thompson, called it the “best advertising quarter of the year.”
abstract: New York Times Company reports revenue of $367 million and net income of more than $9 million for third quarter of 2015, .7 percent increase from same period year earlier.
lead_paragraph: Despite a 5 percent drop in digital advertising, the company’s chief executive, Mark Thompson, called it the “best advertising quarter of the year.”

headline.print_headline: Times Co. Posts Profit That Beats Forecasts
headline.main: New York Times Co. Reports $9 Million Profit in 3rd Quarter
